name: unsentimental
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not influenced by emotions or not giving too much importance to emotions, especially love or sadness: They have an unsentimental approach to life. Her reminiscences of her impoverished childhood are vivid and unsentimental. Opposite
sentimentalCompare
anti-sentimental
More examplesFewer examplesThe film is a gritty, unsentimental drama.This is an affecting yet determinedly unsentimental film.He has written an admirably unsentimental, balanced memoir. The programme is an unsentimental yet compassionate portrait of the singer. He loves this place, but his observations are acute and unsentimental - he describes a landscape that is blighted by housing and forestry.
